select su.id, su.phone, su.avatar, su.email, su.create_time, su.sex , su.username, su.status from sys_user su
inner join sys_user_relation_role surr on su.id = surr.relation_id
inner join sys_user_relation_org suro on su.id = suro.user_id
where su.invalid = 0 and su.phone like concat('%', #{filter.phone}, '%') and su.email like concat('%', #{filter.email}, '%') and su.username like concat('%', #{filter.username}, '%') and su.status = #{filter.status}
and (su.phone like concat('%', #{filter.comprehensive}, '%') or su.username like concat('%', #{filter.comprehensive}, '%'))
and su.id in
#{userId}
and surr.invalid = 0 and surr.role_id = #{filter.roleId} and suro.invalid = 0 and suro.org_id = #{filter.orgId} order by su.id desc
